title: [Solhaven, Bayside Road]
description: You can barely hear the roar of the Cairnfang falling into Solhaven Bay from here.  The Bay stretches out before you, sunlight glinting on the deep blue waters.  Dwarves, elves, half-elves, and humans push southward, headed into the city.

You can barely hear the roar of the Cairnfang falling into Solhaven Bay from here.  The Bay stretches out before you, moonlight glinting on the deep blue waters.  Dwarves, elves, half-elves, and humans push southward, headed into the city.
